sentences.en: “We’ve had millions of transactions to date, and it’s not just geeky nerdy people, it’s everyday consumers,” he said.
sentences.cn: “目前我们已经有几百万美元的交易，这不只是令人讨厌的呆板的人，是普通的消费者，”他说。

sentences.en: But nowadays plots instead see the geeks keep their geeky ways - but still getting the rewards.
sentences.cn: 但现在这些“新男性偶像”只要保持“异样”、就依然能够受到追捧.

sentences.en: I always figured you just thought I was Monica's geeky older brother.
sentences.cn: 我总想你认为我不过是莫妮卡的书呆子哥哥.

sentences.en: On his return I began to notice an alteration in my reliably geeky - nerd companion.
sentences.cn: 他回来后,我发现我的这位曾经和我一起沉迷电脑游戏的朋友变了.

sentences.en: We the people of the mental eyed - geeky, they also contributed to this arrogance.
sentences.cn: 而我们国人的崇洋媚外心理, 也助长了他们的这种气焰.
